member.name: T:Dynamicweb.BulkDataEdit.BulkDataEditManager
member.summary: Manager class to provide access to module and scheduled tasks settings and allow bulk updates of those settings.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.BulkDataEdit.BulkDataEditManager.GetModuleData(System.Boolean,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the settings for each registered field of a supported module.
member.param: Whether or not to include fields without a value.
The system name of the module to filter on. When null, settings for all supported modules are returned.
The ID of the area to filter on. When null, module settings for all paragraphs on all pages for all areas are retrieved.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.BulkDataEdit.BulkDataEditManager.GetScheduledTaskData(System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the settings for each registered field of a supported module.
member.param: Whether or not to include fields without a value.
The database ID of a task to filter on..

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.BulkDataEdit.BulkDataEditManager.GetSupportedModules(Dynamicweb.BulkDataEdit.Parsers.ParserType)
member.summary: Gets a list of the modules (their system names) whose settings can be changed by the DataChangeManager.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.BulkDataEdit.BulkDataEditManager.GetAvailableScheduledTasks
member.summary: Gets a list of the available scheduled tasks.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.BulkDataEdit.BulkDataEditManager.UpdateModuleSettings(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Dynamicweb.BulkDataEdit.ModuleSettings})
member.summary: Updates a specific settings for a module on a paragraph.
member.param: The ID of the paragraph that contains the module that needs to be updated.
The new fields and values for the module settings.

member.name: T:Dynamicweb.BulkDataEdit.ModuleSettings
member.summary: Wrapper class for editable data coming from modules.

member.summary: Creates the unique key by joining the parts using .

member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the area this module is published on.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the area this module is published on.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the scheduled task.

member.summary: Gets or sets the DW module system name.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the field from the module settings.
